translations.You were invited to a <strong>conversati: You were invited to a conversation or had a call
translations.Welcome to Nextcloud Talk!\nIn this conv:
Welcome to Nextcloud Talk!
In this conversation you will be informed about new features available in Nextcloud Talk.
translations.- Microsoft Edge and Safari can now be u: - Microsoft Edge and Safari can now be used to participate in audio and video calls
translations.- One-to-one conversations are now persi: - One-to-one conversations are now persistent and cannot be turned into group conversations by accident anymore. Also when one of the participants leaves the conversation, the conversation is not automatically deleted anymore. Only if both participants leave, the conversation is deleted from the server
translations.- You can now notify all participants by: - You can now notify all participants by posting "@all" into the chat
translations.- With the \"arrow-up\" key you can repo: - With the "arrow-up" key you can repost your last message
translations.- Talk can now have commands, send \"/he: - Talk can now have commands, send "/help" as a chat message to see if your administrator configured some
translations.- With projects you can create quick lin: - With projects you can create quick links between conversations, files and other items
translations.- You can now mention guests in the chat: - You can now mention guests in the chat
translations.- Conversations can now have a lobby. Th: - Conversations can now have a lobby. This will allow moderators to join the chat and call already to prepare the meeting, while users and guests have to wait
translations.- You can now directly reply to messages: - You can now directly reply to messages giving the other users more context what your message is about
translations.- Searching for conversations and partic: - Searching for conversations and participants will now also filter your existing conversations, making it much easier to find previous conversations
translations.- You can now add custom user groups to: - You can now add custom user groups to conversations when the circles app is installed
translations.- Check out the new grid and call view: - Check out the new grid and call view
translations.- You can now upload and drag'n'drop fil: - You can now upload and drag'n'drop files directly from your device into the chat
translations.- Shared files are now opened directly i: - Shared files are now opened directly inside the chat view with the viewer apps
translations.- You can now search for chats and messa: - You can now search for chats and messages in the unified search in the top bar
translations.- Spice up your messages with emojis fro: - Spice up your messages with emojis from the emoji picker
translations.- You can now change your camera and mic: - You can now change your camera and microphone while being in a call
translations.- Raise your hand in a call with the R k: - Raise your hand in a call with the R key
translations.- Join the same conversation and call fr: - Join the same conversation and call from multiple devices
translations.- Send voice messages, share your locati: - Send voice messages and share your location or contact details
translations.There are currently no commands availabl: There are currently no commands available.
translations.An error occurred while running the comm: An error occurred while running the command. Please ask an administrator to check the logs.
translations.An administrator renamed the conversatio: An administrator renamed the conversation from "%1$s" to "%2$s"
translations.An error occurred. Please contact your a: An error occurred. Please contact your admin.

translations.A STUN server is used to determine the p: A STUN server is used to determine the public IP address of participants behind a router.

translations.Sharing your screen only works with Fire: Sharing your screen only works with Firefox version 52 or newer.

translations.Please use a different browser like Fire: Please use a different browser like Firefox or Chrome to share your screen.

The password is wrong. Try again.
translations.The TURN server is used to proxy the tra: The TURN server is used to proxy the traffic from participants behind a firewall.
translations.An external signaling server can optiona: An external signaling server can optionally be used for larger installations. Leave empty to use the internal signaling server.
translations.- One-to-one conversations are now persi: - One-to-one conversations are now persistent and can not be turned into group conversations by accident any more. Also when one of the participants leaves the conversation, the conversation is not automatically deleted any more. Only if both participants leave, the conversation is deleted from the server
